message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the opportunity to purchase this product. I would like to counteroffer at $100.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'll offer you the product for $110.
